MS MCQs

    Microsoft Azure Artificial Intelligence (AI) strategy and solutions

    »

    1. What are the foundational elements of artificial intelligence (AI)?

      Vision, speech, and language

      Security, privacy, and compliance

      On-premises, cloud, and hybrid

      Data, cloud, and algorithms


    2. Which AI solution can help extract useful insights from large amounts of unstructured data?

      Knowledge mining

      Internet of Things

      Azure Cosmos DB

      Azure Bot Services


    3. Azure Cognitive Services are pre-trained AI models that fall under the following broad categories:

      Search, vision, speech, language, knowledge

      Search, vision, language, bots, knowledge

      Vision, knowledge, language, speech, apps

      Vision, speech, knowledge, language, data


    4. Sophisticated pre-trained models, popular frameworks, productive services, powerful infrastructure, and flexible deployment refer to:

      Azure Cognitive Services

      Azure machine learning layers

      Azure App Services - Web Apps

      AI apps and agents


    5. At Microsoft, six ethical principles guide the development and use of artificial intelligence with people at the center of everything we do. The first three are fairness, reliability & safety, and inclusiveness. What are the other three?

      Privacy & security, transparency, and accountability

      Predictive maintenance, retail recommendations, and fraud and anomaly detection

      AI apps and agents, knowledge mining, machine learning

      Innovate, transform industries, and transform societies
